comment_body: @qiluo-msft could you please help review/Merge the PR?
Azure Pipelines successfully started running 1 pipeline(s).
Hi @StormLiangMS, could you please help cherry-pick?
hi @lolyu  do we have test with 202305 with this one?
Azure Pipelines successfully started running 1 pipeline(s).

@StormLiangMS @yxieca - Can you please help in merging this to 202305 and 202311?
MSFT ADO - 27254777

> Please add unit tests for this

@arlakshm added in https://github.com/sonic-net/sonic-utilities/pull/3234

resubmit reverted PR https://github.com/sonic-net/sonic-utilities/pull/3077
The regression due to #3077 has been fixed via https://github.com/sonic-net/sonic-utilities/pull/3130

@prsunny @judyjoseph @abdosi this PR was earlier reverted due to an issue got exposed on multi-asic T1, which has been fixed now via #3130 . Changes from this PR are already merged into 202205 and 202305(as the FRR check code is only present in master).. Kindly help review the changes for master.
@prsunny @qiluo-msft could you please help review/Merge this PR? Thanks!
Azure Pipelines successfully started running 1 pipeline(s).
hi @bingwang-ms, could you run test with 202305 image?

> hi @bingwang-ms, could you run test with 202305 image?

Yes, the test has been done on 202305 image by manually cherry-pick and run the image upgrade.
Since the base PR https://github.com/sonic-net/sonic-utilities/pull/3148 is not merged, it will auto set `cherry pick conflict` for 202305 and 202311. Will add 2023XX flag after base PR merged.
@rlhui @judyjoseph Please review this PR for master branch.
Hi @vaibhavhd , this extra YANG validation would be happen during load_minigraph. Just want to make sure this doesn't impact warm reboot.
Discussed with @wen587 offline about using log_err or log_warning. Considering check failure does not really mean something is broken and not working, use log_warning may be better.
HI @wen587 this one more like an enhancement, is that must to have for 202305?

Hi @StormLiangMS , the PR is conflict fixed in https://github.com/sonic-net/sonic-utilities/pull/3195.
I suggest to add to 202305. This will help us to find YANG issue in PROD by syslog without using GCU features.
@mihirpat1 can you explain "Why I did this" too in  the PR description

> @mihirpat1 can you explain "Why I did this" too in the PR description

@prgeor I have added this section now.

@StormLiangMS @yxieca - Can you please help with cherry-pick to 202305 and 202311?
MSFT ADO - 26801913
hi @mihirpat1  could you run test with 202305 image with this PR?
@qiluo-msft  The code change is simple and just adding a try exception block. This scenario is hard to replicate through UT and I request exception for coverage for this PR

> @qiluo-msft The code change is simple and just adding a try exception block. This scenario is hard to replicate through UT and I request exception for coverage for this PR

Recommend still add UT to cover the lines. It is possible to mock some functions to reach the code branch. #Closed

> > @qiluo-msft The code change is simple and just adding a try exception block. This scenario is hard to replicate through UT and I request exception for coverage for this PR
> 
> Recommend still add UT to cover the lines. It is possible to mock some functions to reach the code branch.

I am trying to add. Will update if I can add

> > > @qiluo-msft The code change is simple and just adding a try exception block. This scenario is hard to replicate through UT and I request exception for coverage for this PR
> > 
> > 
> > Recommend still add UT to cover the lines. It is possible to mock some functions to reach the code branch.
> 
> I am trying to add. Will update if I can add

Added UT and coverage is passing now.
@abdosi auto-cherry pick had conflicts on 202305, raised manual PR. could you please help to merge on this
@yxieca  would you please help to cherry-pick to 202311?
@prgeor @qinchuanares @SuvarnaMeenakshi - Can you please help in review this?
Azure Pipelines successfully started running 1 pipeline(s).

@StormLiangMS, @yxieca - Can you please help with cherry-pick to 202205, 202305 and 202311?

@yxieca , can you help approve this bug fix for 202205?  Or we need to pick this into msft repo manually?

@arlakshm  @gechiang could you run test with 202305 image on single asic to avoid any regression?

> @isabelmsft - Please see [sonic-net/sonic-buildimage#18207](https://github.com/sonic-net/sonic-buildimage/pull/18207)

Thanks @matiAlfaro, the requirement that vlan exists before IP address is configured is supported in yang model here: https://github.com/sonic-net/sonic-buildimage/blob/master/src/sonic-yang-models/yang-models/sonic-vlan.yang#L125

So this PR LGTM

@yxieca - Can you please help to cherry-pick this to 202311?
ADO - 26729886
@mihirpat1 @yxieca  Here is the manual cherry-pick PR https://github.com/sonic-net/sonic-utilities/pull/3160
let's not using "masic" as terminology, please update PR title. #Closed

What I did
Update show runningconfiguration all to cover asics config

How I did it
Loop host and each asic to get config, then combine into one.
@wen587 could you run test with 202305 image and single asic devices?

Hi @StormLiangMS , sure. It will not impact the single devices output.
Tested in single asic device of 202305 image below.

Sorry I missed this review.
Can you please confirm if the change only applies to the scenario when installing SONiC from ONiE?

> Sorry I missed this review. Can you please confirm if the change only applies to the scenario when installing SONiC from ONiE?

Hi
It is applied whenever the buffer configuration is empty. In most cases, it should be the case that the device is installed from ONIE.
In case a user removes all the buffer/QoS configurations and then saves the configuration, and then executes `config reload` it should also be applied.
